sn9.11:1.1: Ekam samayam annataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati annatarasmim vanasande.
sn9.11:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divaviharagato papake akusale vitakke vitakketi, seyyathidam—
sn9.11:1.4: Atha kho ya tasmim vanasande adhivattha devata tassa bhikkhuno anukampika atthakama tam bhikkhum samvejetukama yena so bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum gathahi ajjhabhasi:
sn9.11:4.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu taya devataya samvejito samvegamapaditi.
